title: Hostile Compliance
description: Corporate counsel is legally blocking investigative access to critical evidence.

scenes.narrative: You've arrived at the corporate headquarters where legal counsel is invoking privacy laws to prevent access to the investigation site.

choices.label: Negotiate with counsel to find a compromise.
choices.consequence: You reach an agreement that allows limited access while maintaining legal compliance.

choices.label: Review legal precedents for similar cases.
choices.consequence: You find a loophole that allows access under emergency provisions.

choices.label: Bypass legal channels with technical access tools.
choices.consequence: Technical tools allow you to access the site without legal permission.

choices.label: The legal block feels like a distraction - find another way in.
choices.consequence: You discover an unguarded service entrance that bypasses legal restrictions.

scenes.narrative: Inside the restricted area, you find evidence of tampering, but counsel is demanding you leave immediately.

choices.label: Explain the urgency to counsel to buy time.
choices.consequence: Counsel grants a brief extension to document the evidence.

choices.label: Document evidence with precise legal language.
choices.consequence: Your documentation withstands legal scrutiny and preserves the case.

choices.label: Use mobile scanning to capture evidence digitally.
choices.consequence: Scanners capture all evidence before legal removal is enforced.

choices.label: The counsel's timing is suspicious - they're protecting something.
choices.consequence: You uncover additional evidence that implicates the counsel in the obstruction.
